items.title: 网站初始化
items.content_html:
# issue

（恕我并不怎么会前端，在使用即食罐头时无法正常运行）

使用即食罐头时，执行完毕以下指令

git clone https://github.com/theme-shoka-x/shokax-can --depth=1
cd shokax-can
pnpm install

在执行：hexo s 时，发生报错：（换用 pnpm dlx hexo s 也出现一样的错误）

We received a report that if the image_list is less than 6 items, it will cause block on main thread, then the terminal will crash.
So we throw an error to avoid it happens.
Unhandled rejection Error: C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\themes\shokax\layout\_partials\layout.pug:5
    3| include ../_mixin/widgets.pug
    4|
  > 5| - var covers = _cover_index(page, 6)
    6| - var enableFixedCover = theme.homeConfig?.fixedCover
    7| - var enablePreload = theme.homeConfig?.coverConfig?.enablePreload
    8| - var enableCover = theme.homeConfig?.coverConfig?.enableCover

image_list must have at least 6 items
    at randomBG (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\themes\shokax\scripts\helpers\engine.js:19:13)
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\themes\shokax\scripts\helpers\engine.js:81:12)
    at eval (eval at wrap (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\pug-runtime@3.0.1\node_modules\pug-runtime\wrap.js:6:10), <anonymous>:622:14)
    at template (eval at wrap (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\pug-runtime@3.0.1\node_modules\pug-runtime\wrap.js:6:10), <anonymous>:1181:7)
    at _View._compiled (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\theme\view.js:120:67)
    at _View.render (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\theme\view.js:37:21)
    at C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\hexo\index.js:60:29
    at tryCatcher (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\bluebird@3.7.2\node_modules\bluebird\js\release\util.js:16:23)
    at C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\bluebird@3.7.2\node_modules\bluebird\js\release\method.js:15:34
    at RouteStream._read (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\hexo\router.js:43:9)
    at Readable.read (node:internal/streams/readable:739:12)
    at resume_ (node:internal/streams/readable:1257:12)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:90:21)

定位到报错地方：

hexo.extend.helper.register("_cover_index", function(item) {
  const { index_images, image_list, image_server } = hexo.theme.config;
  if (item.cover) {
    return this._image_url(item.cover, item.path);
  } else if (item.photos && item.photos.length > 0) {
    return this._image_url(item.photos[0], item.path);
  } else {
    return randomBG(6, image_server, index_images.length === 0 ? image_list : index_images);  // 此处报错
  }
});

应该是图片数量 image_list 不足 6 张，尝试添加图片并修改配置文件

shokax-can
	- source
		- images
			- bg1.jpg
			- bg2.jpg
			- bg3.jpg
			- bg4.jpg
			- bg5.jpg
			- bg6.jpg

	_config.shokax.yml

在根目录下的 _config.shokax.yml 添加

index_images:
  - /source/images/bg1.jpg
  - /source/images/bg2.jpg
  - /source/images/bg3.jpg
  - /source/images/bg4.jpg
  - /source/images/bg5.jpg
  - /source/images/bg6.jpg

再次尝试运行，出现同样的报错。

尝试修改常量值

return randomBG(
  Math.min(6, index_images.length || image_list.length),
  image_server,
  index_images.length === 0 ? image_list : index_images
);

但是发生报错：

Unhandled rejection TypeError: C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\themes\shokax\layout\_partials\layout.pug:5
    3| include ../_mixin/widgets.pug
    4|
  > 5| - var covers = _cover_index(page, 6)
    6| - var enableFixedCover = theme.homeConfig?.fixedCover
    7| - var enablePreload = theme.homeConfig?.coverConfig?.enablePreload
    8| - var enableCover = theme.homeConfig?.coverConfig?.enableCover

Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length')
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\themes\shokax\scripts\helpers\engine.js:81:67)
    at eval (eval at wrap (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\pug-runtime@3.0.1\node_modules\pug-runtime\wrap.js:6:10), <anonymous>:622:14)
    at template (eval at wrap (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\pug-runtime@3.0.1\node_modules\pug-runtime\wrap.js:6:10), <anonymous>:1181:7)
    at _View._compiled (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\theme\view.js:120:67)
    at _View.render (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\theme\view.js:37:21)
    at C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\hexo\index.js:60:29
    at tryCatcher (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\bluebird@3.7.2\node_modules\bluebird\js\release\util.js:16:23)
    at C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\bluebird@3.7.2\node_modules\bluebird\js\release\method.js:15:34
    at RouteStream._read (C:\Workspace\Projects\self\shokax-can\node_modules\.pnpm\hexo@7.3.0_chokidar@3.6.0\node_modules\hexo\dist\hexo\router.js:43:9)
    at Readable.read (node:internal/streams/readable:739:12)
    at resume_ (node:internal/streams/readable:1257:12)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:90:21)

# 解决

在发 issue 的时候发现已经提出过这个问题了，只需要在 source/_data/ 下创建 images.yml 并插入至少 6 张图片，就可以正常启动了！

官方文档：图片自定义
